pkgmetadata.longdescription: pretty-ncols allows for the following layouts to work nicely, so that: One Two Three 1 2 3 a b c can be written as: cols_rowMajor = map text $ [["One", "Two", "Three"], ["1", "2","3"], ["a","b","c"]] cols_colMajor = transpose $ cols_rowMajors asColumns cols_rowMajor asColumns cols_colMajor
